thread.title: Apple chief shrugs off nation’s economic slowdown
thread.title_full: Apple chief shrugs off nation’s economic slowdown

title: Apple chief shrugs off nation’s economic slowdown
text:
Apple chief shrugs off nation’s economic slowdown 
Global Times Friday 23rd October, 2015 
US technology giant Apple Inc will keep investing in China despite slowing growth in the world's second-largest economy, Chief Executive Tim Cook said, as the company prepares to open its newest store in the Chinese mainland."I know some people are worried about the economy. We'll continue to invest," Cook told the official Xinhua News Agency, according to a report late Wednesday."China is a superb place to be. Nothing has changed that," Cook said while on a visit to the country.China's economy logged its worst performance in the third quarter since the global financial crisis six years ago...
